biotools.summary: Method to identify domains in a protein sequence from similarity searches using PSI-BLAST. The identified domains are used in individual PSI-BLAST searches to improve detection of distant homologous sequences. The tool iterates until no new domains are found.

bioschemas.name: DOMAINATION_Domain_Prediction
bioschemas.summary: Method to identify domains in a protein sequence from similarity searches using PSI-BLAST. The identified domains are used in individual PSI-BLAST searches to improve detection of distant homologous sequences. The tool iterates until no new domains are found.
